fields.title: K-Anonymity
fields.description: The following questions will be used to to determine if the characteristics of their dataset that are related to K-Anonymity.
fields.help_tip: Depending on the answers to these questions we will know whether to recommend further deidentification.

fields.question: What is the current K-Anonymity of the dataset?
fields.help_tip: K-Anonymity is the minimum number of unique combinations of quazi-identifiers found in a dataset, if a single row has a unique combination quazi-identifiers, then the k-anonymity would be.

fields.question: What is the K-Anonymity of the dataset when combined with the larger dataset?
fields.help_tip: K-Anonymity is the minimum number of unique combinations of quazi-identifiers found in a dataset, if a single row has a unique combination quazi-identifiers, then the k-anonymity would be 1.
